title: Call for practitioners in neonatal and infant cardiology
categories: NHS Newborn and Infant Physical Examination

content.text: The NHS newborn and infant physical examination (NIPE) screening programme is currently looking for practitioners in the field of neonatal and infant cardiology and cardiac surgery to review the NIPE heart screening pathway.

The PHE NIPE screening team plan to hold meetings in 2021 to 2022 to review the heart pathway with a representative group of practitioners. The first of these meetings is being planned for autumn 2021 and will be held virtually via Microsoft Teams.
